subject: Shipping to Poland.
description_text:
Hello, do you ship your products to Poland, i can’t find „Poland” as an
option in country/region section at the checkout. If i order these pedals,
i will need to get them before Christmas (24th December). Thanks for
anwsering in advance!

conversations.body_text: Hi Hubert Górzyński,  ​  This is the link to our Polish brand distributor's store (https://fmic.pl/elektronika/simracing?product_brand=Simsonn). You can purchase the product through this link, and they will ship it directly from Poland.
